Package ohos.agp.components.listcomponent

Class ItemTouchExpand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.ListAdornment
      • ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.ItemTouchExpand

  • public class ItemTouchExpand
extends ListAdornment
    Implements the dragging and swiping effects for components.
    Since:
    7

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ohos.agp.components.listcomponent.ListAdornment

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int DOWN
      Indicates the downward direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.
      static int DRAG_ANIMATION_TYPE
      An animation indicating that the component is dragged.
      static int END
      Indicates the horizontal end direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.
      static int ITEM_TOUCH_DRAG_STATE
      Indicates that the component is being dragged.
      static int ITEM_TOUCH_IDLE_STATE
      Indicates that the ItemTouchHelper is in the idle state.
      static int ITEM_TOUCH_SWIPE_STATE
      Indicates that the component is being swiped.
      static int LEFT
      Indicates the leftward direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.
      static int RIGHT
      Indicates the rightward direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.
      static int START
      Indicates the horizontal start direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.
      static int SWIPE_CANCEL_ANIMATION_TYPE
      An animation indicating that component swiping has been canceled.
      static int SWIPE_SUCCESS_ANIMATION_TYPE
      An animation indicating the component that can be swiped successfully.
      static int UP
      Indicates the upward direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.

        An animation indicating that the component is dragged.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • END

        public static final int END
        Indicates the horizontal end direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.

        It can be LEFT or RIGHT based on the layout orientation of the ListComponent.

        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ITEM_TOUCH_DRAG_STATE

        public static final int ITEM_TOUCH_DRAG_STATE
        Indicates that the component is being dragged.
        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ITEM_TOUCH_IDLE_STATE

        public static final int ITEM_TOUCH_IDLE_STATE
        Indicates that the ItemTouchHelper is in the idle state.

        In this state, the user does not swipe or drag a component, or the latest swipe or drag action has not been triggered.

        Since:
        7
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ITEM_TOUCH_SWIPE_STATE

        public static final int ITEM_TOUCH_SWIPE_STATE
        Indicates that the component is being swiped.
        Since:
        7

        public static final int START
        Indicates the horizontal start direction, which is used in swiping and dragging.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemTouchExpand

        public ItemTouchExpand​(ItemTouchExpandCallback callback)
        A constructor used to create an ItemTouchExpand instance based on an ItemTouchExpandCallback.

        You can call boundToListComponent(ohos.agp.components.ListComponent) to bind an ItemTouchExpand instance to a ListComponent.

        Parameters:
        callback - Indicates the callback for the behavior of the ItemTouchExpand instance.
        Since:
        7

    • Method Detail

      • createNativePtr

        protected void createNativePtr​()
        Creates a native pointer to this ItemTouchExpand instance.
        Overrides:
        createNativePtr in class ListAdornment
        Since:
        7

      • boundToListComponent

        public void boundToListComponent​(ListComponent listComponent)
        Binds this ItemTouchExpand instance to a ListComponent.

        If the ItemTouchExpand instance has been bound to another ListComponent, it will be unbound from that ListComponent first.

        Parameters:
        ListComponent - Indicates the ListComponent to which the ItemTouchExpand instance will be bound.
        Since:
        7

      • setSwipeEscapeSpeed

        public void setSwipeEscapeSpeed​(float swipeSpeed)
        Sets the minimum speed of the swipe operation.
        Parameters:
        swipeSpeed - Indicates the minimum speed to set.
        Since:
        7

      • getSwipeEscapeSpeed

        public float getSwipeEscapeSpeed​()
        Obtains the minimum speed of the swipe operation.
        Returns:
        Returns the minimum speed if obtained; returns 0.F if an exception occurs.
        Since:
        7

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        toPos - End point.
